TopicTitle: Your avatar is stuck in an elevator with the above poster's avatar, what do you do?

Articles.Content: likes the fact that I'm alone.

You never were... *points up*

*UFOs everywhere*

Now if their reason is to help you... Well... That I can't guarantee.
"this elevaator has a ceiling. right?"

Oh. Err... *HAMMER*

*Teleports away from the elevator doing a retarded laugh*
poker face...

Reminds everyone that the elevator shaft and the elevator (with its contents) are currently floating in an absolute void, therefore you cannot exit at any floors. If you opened the doors, you'd die no matter what.

Does the void have a flag?

Because if not, it's my void now.
The void is now filling with infinite varieties of flags.

*step in, comming from a alternate universe

... darn wormhole!
"you look delecious , wait, I'm a vegetarian ."
"Wait, how am I supposed to get to the game in that... that 'submarine' thing?"
"You can't the elevator is in a void :("
*take out a copy of the hitchhiker guide to the galaxy.
What is this... I don't even...

(!!!Inside joke!!!)

*take out a other book titled "Cupcake" and respond to the pony in a space suit...

"It's like the encyclopedia of the universe"

Edited September 27, 2013 by mrrpamplemousse

*facedesk*

"How do you know this stuff?"

and why do you have to torment us!

"Well it's a long story, all started when... Do you realy want to listen to the tale of the stange space squid?"

also sorry for that, maybe I was too provocating?

"Also, are we alone or the hockey player wasn't a halucination?"

Edited September 27, 2013 by mrrpamplemousse

"Yes, I do want to listen. TELL ME ABOUT IT!"

you don't say...

"Ok, everything started when I first heard of MLP, everywhere I was going, someone was being a brony (I wasn't concious of this term back then). I was realy disapointed, why would so many people like it so I started rechearch and then BAMMM, I was corrupted. I was more and more curious and finaly... CUPCAKE!"

(That must be boring for other people so...)

Alternate story : "Nevermind, I was tinking of an old story, nice weather today?"
"uhhh, your a brony?"
"Only an half, and it's purely an accident"

*realizes there are probably people watching us talk about ponies*

"uh, whatever :P"

(I think most bronies became bronies out of curiosity anyways )

"What did you said, people are observing us?"

(maybe endless no-sense talk about ponies is why the brony thead was obliterated)

Edited September 27, 2013 by mrrpamplemousse

purging all space ponies and talk of space ponies and bronies. For space ponies and bronies are heresy (there probably demons too).

Edited September 27, 2013 by briansun1

"Who the heck are you, how did you get in this elevator"

(don't rage about ponies, please, it's only a non-standart hoby, and I think im well placed to said that (im an half a bronies, remember))
